subtitleNullable: Object Detection Dataset with 4 classes in VOC Format
descriptionNullable:
### Context

This dataset was curated for a research project that deals with monkey theft detection. To be more versatile and generalizable dataset contains 3 more categories other than monkeys which include person, dog and cat.


### Content

This Dataset consists of images along with their annotations in csv file. Dataset also consists of tfrecords files of images and annotations.
- `train.csv` : csv file consist of training images and their annotations.
- `test.csv` : csv file consist of test images and their annotations.
- `train.tfrecord` : training data tfrecord file with images and annotations.
- `test.tfrecord` : test data tfrecord file with images and annotations.
- jpg images of 4 categories with approx 3000 images per category


### Acknowledgements

Dataset curated from [Open Image Dataset](https://opensource.google/projects/open-images-dataset) using [OIDv4_ToolKit](https://github.com/EscVM/OIDv4_ToolKit)
